channel.title: Need help my no-ip sever isent working!
channel.description:
i make a acc on the no -ip website and i made a hose name(cod4scape.no-ip.org) and for the ip i put my hamachi ip (5.56.199.59) and i tryed my main ip (69.202.71.242) and then when i tell my friend to log on my sever he cant. so wht do i do now??????????????
and i downloaded that DUC V2.2.1 and for 1 sec i get
[Sun 01:35] cod4scape.no-ip.org: DNS update successful.
then i get this when i push refreash
[Sun 01:35] cod4scape.no-ip.org: DNS is current, no update needed.
If u help me i will give u a 100k in rs plz help me

item.title: Need help my no-ip sever isent working!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

[quote=“shadow60910, post:1, topic:160507”]i make a acc on the no -ip website and i made a hose name(cod4scape.no-ip.org) and for the ip i put my hamachi ip (5.56.199.59) and i tryed my main ip (69.202.71.242) and then when i tell my friend to log on my sever he cant. so wht do i do now???

and i downloaded that DUC V2.2.1 and for 1 sec i get

[Sun 01:35] cod4scape.no-ip.org: DNS update successful.

then i get this when i push refreash

[Sun 01:35] cod4scape.no-ip.org: DNS is current, no update needed.

If u help me i will give u a 100k in rs plz help me[/quote]

Don’t offer rs cash…

And did you open up your firewall for the port?

item.title: Need help my no-ip sever isent working!
item.dc:creator: @yazoomafroo yazoomafroo
item.description:
@yazoomafroo wrote:

i think this is in the wrong section but if you want to get it to work go on:
whatsmyip.org and use the ip at the top of the page
or try getting another no ip that is like .servegame.com

it happened to me the other day and .no-ip.org was not working so just change it in the dropdown when you add a host

Read full topic
